## brms

```{r cache=TRUE, eval = FALSE}
library(brms)
Amat <- nadiv::makeA(Ped)

model_simple1.1 <- brm(
  bwt ~ 1 + (1 | animal) + (1 | animal_pe),
  data = gryphonRM,
  family = gaussian(), cov_ranef = list(animal = Amat),
  chains = 2, cores = 2, iter = 1000
)

summary(model_simple1.1)
plot(model_simple1.1)
```
